briefTitle: Breast Cancer Tumor Care Observational Programme
officialTitle: Breast Cancer Tumor Care Patient Observation Programme
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Progression of disease and tolerability in general
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal women
* Already on upfront Arimidex Therapy (Start 1-4 weeks before)
* HR+

Exclusion Criteria:

* Premenopausal women
* Tamoxifen switch patients
